Q_DESC:
In an Engineering Institution, the college management has decided not to work on all Saturdays and Sundays. All public holidays are also nonworking. Assume that the first day of the year is a Sunday and it is numbered as 1. Given a day and details regarding whether it is a public holiday or not, write a Mathslab program to determine whether the college is working on that day or not.
Sample input
Enter the day number : 10
Is it a public holiday? Enter 1 for yes and 0 for no : 0
Output
Working day
